snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. was preparing to issue policies aimed at eliminating the distinction between same- and opposite-sex married couples in the federal criminal justice system.
abstract: Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr is preparing to issue policies aimed at eliminating distinction between same- and opposite-sex married couples in the federal criminal justice system; changes will result in federal government treating married same-sex couples same as heterosexual couples when they file for bankruptcy, testify in court or visit family in prison.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. was preparing to issue policies aimed at eliminating the distinction between same- and opposite-sex married couples in the federal criminal justice system.

headline.main: More Federal Privileges to Extend to Same-Sex Couples
headline.print_headline: More Federal Privileges to Extend to Same-Sex Couples

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
